For everyone having sounds issues after installing the language pack! Use these Steps:

1.) Change the Ini (SKIDROW.ini) to following (in the Rage InstallFolder)

[Game]

# Environment Application Id.
AppId = 9200

# Change the language only if the game uses steam_api/steamclient to decide it.
Language = " Your Language in English"

[Settings]

# You might want change this.
PlayerName =*Your name* (without*)

2.) Use Launcher.exe (as Administrator) and change into desired language 

3.) Have Pfhun !!! ;)
